app.name: WiiSPACE
app.long_description:
The online high score table can be found at http://www.seiken.co.uk/WiiSPACE. For more detailed information and game help, see http://www.wiibrew.org/WiiSPACE.
An original retro-themed spaceship shoot-'em-up supporting up to 4 simultaneous players for co-operative play. Features include powerups, bosses, high scores, and an aiming system allowing independent movement and targeting.
Controls (Wiimote and nunchuk) Start, pause - Minus, home or plus Menu navigation - D-pad Menu accept, menu cancel - A, B Control spaceship - Nunchuk analog stick Control targeting crosshair - Wiimote aim Fire - B Use bomb - A or Z
Controls (Gamecube controller) Start, pause - Start Menu navigation - D-pad Menu accept, menu cancel - A, B Control spaceship - Analog stick Control targeting crosshair - C-stick Fire - R or C-stick Use bomb - A or L
Controls (Classic controller) Start, pause - Minus, home or plus Menu navigation - D-pad Menu accept, menu cancel - B, Y Control spaceship - Left analog stick Control targeting crosshair - Right analog stick Fire - R or right analog stick Use bomb - B or L
